snippet: Alpha Natural Resources and 66 of its subsidiaries agreed to reduce pollution from coal mines in Kentucky, Pennsylvania, Tennessee, Virginia and West Virginia.
abstract: Alpha Natural Resources, one of the nation's biggest coal companies, will pay a record civil penalty and will spend tens of millions of dollars to clean up water flowing from mines in five states.
lead_paragraph: Alpha Natural Resources and 66 of its subsidiaries agreed to reduce pollution from coal mines in Kentucky, Pennsylvania, Tennessee, Virginia and West Virginia.

headline.main: Coal Firm to Pay Record Penalty and Spend Millions on Water Cleanup in 5 States
headline.print_headline: Coal Firm to Pay Record Penalty and Spend Millions on Water Cleanup in 5 States
